name: GloomyHouseDemo by Niyazi Berkay
description:
This is a little learning demo made by Niyazi Berkay Çokuysal

You have to find and collect 10 keys before the time runs out.

This demo contains the functionalities down below.

  • Time Counter
  • FPS & LOD & Foliage & Material Optimization
  • Working with Royalty Free Assets
  • Character Interaction With Objects
  • TPS to FPS Angle Change
  • Different Footsteps & Music & Sound Design
  • Menu & Pause & GameOver Widgets
  • Collectibles
  • MetaHuman
  • Water Plugin
  • Ultra Dynamic Sky
  • Post Proccessing

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/niyazi-berkay-%C3%A7okuysal-232936153/
